author: Simon Difford
description: The cacao powder rim echoes the subtle chocolate flavours in this tasty bittersweet aperitivo.
name: Quintessential Royal
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice)
